name: Hardest World Geography Trivia Quiz | Geography | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is the largest lake in surface area (not volume) to lie entirely within one country?
questions.explanation:
Lake Michigan & Michigan.

	Lake Michigan is the sixth largest but the largest to lie in only one country. Lake Baikal is the largest in terms of volume.

questions.text: What country does NOT border Brazil?
If you were in the Gobi Desert, what continent would you be on?
questions.explanation:
Asia.

	The Gobi desert covers a good portion of Mongolia.

questions.text: What U.S. state is nicknamed the Beehive State?
Hispaniola is made up of the Dominican Republic and what other country?
The Gulf of _____________ separates Baja part of Mexico from the mainland of Mexico
questions.explanation:
California.

	It is also known as the Sea of Cortez or Sea of Cortés.

questions.text: If you were to cross the Strait of Gibraltar from Europe to Africa, which African country would you be in? (taking the shortest route)
Which of these European cities is the northernmost?
The Mason-Dixon line was a boundary between which two U.S. States?
What is the capital of Portugal?
